what_is.title: What is Babelfish?
what_is.description: Inspired by the Babel fish from Douglas Adams' The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, Babelfish creates a decentralized ecosystem where users connect effortlessly across 7,000+ languages. Our platform bridges Web2 accessibility with Web3 innovation, enabling seamless global communication for everyone—from casual users to professional networks.
